div.span: Welcome to La Vernia, a proud community just 30 minutes from downtown San Antonio! La Vernia is one of the best places to live in Texas, offering a friendly suburban feel with many amenities of city life. La Vernia's convenient location, superior school system, and excellent quality of life make it a community that many people are proud to call "home".
Come visit our town and find out why we are an attractive place to live, work, and play.

07-30-24 @ 8:18 PM: PSA: LA VERNIA WATER CUSTOMERS: We want to inform you that due to a line break in the 13000 block of US Hwy 87, which occurred during construction along the highway, you may experience low to no water pressure for the next hour or so. Our public works department is currently addressing the issue. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as soon as we have more information. Thank you for your patience.

span.span: Stay Connected with us on your mobile device!

p.span:
We have expanded our communications outreach with a mobile app that is now available in the online Apple App Store® and Google Play® app stores for FREE.
The mobile app offers an updated feed of local news and events and links to the city website. You can also choose to receive push notifications to get breaking news, updates about street closures, calendar changes, or even local events.
It’s FREE…to download and use:
From a smart-device, go to the Apple App Store® or Google Play®
Search "La Vernia. Texas"
Then select the app for free download.
